content.question: Bismarckâ€™s conclusion regarding the feasibility of an alliance between Britain and Russia in the second paragraph is best explained by which of the following?

choices.label: The expansion of the military and naval capabilities of European states
The increasing divergence between the political institutions of Russia and Great Britain
The growing imperial rivalries among European states
The beginning of a Russian effort toward modernization and industrialization

content.answer: The growing imperial rivalries among European states

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
